column1: M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J.
certiorari  quashing  the  decision  of  the  1st  to  5th  Respondents,  namely,  the
Chairman and the Members of the Debt Conciliation Board dated 7th August
2019  (‘X  7’). The  7th  Respondent  filed  a  statement of objection  seeking to
dismiss the Petitioner’s application on the ground that the order marked ‘X 7’
of the Debt Conciliation Board is valid and correct. The other Respondents
did not file objections and the Petitioner filed a counter affidavit in response
to the objections filed by the 7th Respondent.
The matter was fixed for argument once the pleadings were complete. When
the matter was taken up for argument on the 19th October 2023, the 6th and 7th
Respondents  and  the  Petitioner  agreed  to  dispose  the  argument  by  way  of
Thereafter,  both  parties  filed  their  respective  written  submissions  and  the
matter was fixed for the judgement of Court.
